results.name: Smallest prime not dividing n times smallest prime not dividing A276087(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..32768
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
program: A053669(n) = forprime(p=2, , if(n%p, return(p))); \\ From A053669
A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
xref: Cf. A328585 (positions of the prime squares).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 29 2019
